name: Networking
description:
The doordash iOS networking engine was created with ease of use in mind to provide a
unified interface for network connections.
The solution wraps the Foundation framework's URLSession and related objects to
provide HTTP connection.
The main advantage is provided through the high level interfaces where the operation
results can be managed and processed through a chain of processor objects to separate
different use cases, provide data transformation and deserialization, as well as manage
validation.
